cons: It contain caffeine which has been shown to increase the risk of miscarriage if taken in excess amount. So, consult your doctor for
Cocoa beans contains oxalates, which can increase the risk of kidney stones.
description: It contains Magnesium, and other essential minerals including calcium, sulfur, zinc, iron, copper, potassium, and manganese.
Vitamins: B1, B2, B3, B5, B9, E. Essential heart-healthy fat: oleic acid a monounsaturated fat.
Cocoa has demonstrated beneficial effects in inhibiting the growth of cancer cells without affecting the growth of normal healthy cells.
Cocoa extracts have been trusted for their therapeutic and wound-healing properties in the manufacturing of natural medicinal products.
